// DP
// Dearrangment Question

#include<cstdio>
#define ll long long 
#define mod 1000000007
ll dp[10000000];

void precomp()
{
	ll i;
	dp[1]=0;
	dp[2]=1;
	for(i=3; i< 100001; i++)
	{
		dp[i] = ((i-1)%mod*(dp[i-1]%mod + dp[i-2]%mod))%mod;
	}
}

using namespace std;
int main(int argc, char const *argv[])
{
	ll t,n;
	precomp();
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		printf("%lld\n", dp[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
